document.full_text: iceland's volcanic eruption has died down and is no longer spewing out ash, officials said on wednesday and airlines began to get back to normal after cancelling about 1,000 flights in northern europe.
document.title: iceland eruption ending, german airports reopen
lines_and_colors: iceland's volcanic eruption has died down and is no longer spewing out ash, officials said on wednesday and airlines began to get back to normal after cancelling about 1,000 flights in northern europe.
